description: This notification is used to notify if the given

Summary.eval: ($v5==1) ? 'DHCP server $v1 is reachable' : 'DHCP server $v1 is not reachable'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpServerReachability JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpServerIP a 192.0.2.1 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpLogicalSystemName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpRoutingInstanceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpProfileName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpReachability i 1

description: IP address of the dhcp server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpServerIP

description: The name which identifies the logical-system
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpLogicalSystemName

description: The name which identifies the routing instance
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpRoutingInstanceName

description: This notification signifies that the addresses
from a given address pool have exhusted.

event.Summary: DHCP address pool $v5 ran out of addresses. Profile: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpAddrPoolExhaust JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpServerIP a 192.0.2.1 JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpLogicalSystemName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpRoutingInstanceName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpProfileName s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpPoolName s EXAMPLE

description: IP address of the dhcp server.
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpServerIP

description: The name which identifies the logical-system
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpLogicalSystemName

description: The name which identifies the routing instance
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpRoutingInstanceName

description: The configured dhcp pool name with in a dhcp profile
variables.name: JUNIPER-MOBILE-GATEWAY-DHCP-MIB::jnxMbgDhcpPoolName
